title: Bug (idk what to call it) with bewitching Nidalee
body: I recently bought the bewitching {{champion:76}} skin and noticed that her human form E skill (heal) has the base  {{champion:76}} skins animation for it, which instead of having the bats fly around, it has leaves. I'm unsure if it's intentional or not but it sorta feels weird that all her other animations have bats, and her heal doesn't follow that theme.

replies.body: It would probably have bumped her up a skin tier to do more custom particles.

Do you ever read before you write? There would be no extra custom particle, it's always had bats, but it's bugged now and no longer works in human form and Katey is saying it's intentional so whatever. Replacing a particle with an already done one literally takes seconds.

...Why are you being so rude? Just because *a* bat particle already exists does not mean that they would reuse the same one, and they would still have to do work with it, not just plug in the bats where the leaves were.

Yes that's actually exactly what it means since it's literally the exact same effect and that's how it was. It wasn't meant as rude, it was meant to show you that I face palm any time I ever read anything you write. Most people do, they just don't care to respond. They ask me why I bother.

You hate me so much that you have to jump on your smurfs to downvote me and upvote yourself? Whatever is going on with you, you have my sympathy. You are obviously intentionally harassing me, please stop. If you don't like me then don't talk to me.
Who said anything about hate? Smurfs? Are you nuts?

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=WpjG03fY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-10T02:55:12.351+0000)
>
> It would probably have bumped her up a skin tier to do more custom particles.

I doubt it would since all her other animations (jump, spear, trap etc) have the bats instead of the leaves, but hey maybe you're right.

Hey A NaCl n Battery,

For this particular skin, this is working as intended.
Okay thanks for clearing that up =)
